title: Friedell, Slater, and Serrano
description:
Zach talks to ESPN's Nick Friedell and Anthony Slater about all things Warriors: Andrew Wiggins and vaccines, Klay Thompson, and how good Golden State can be this season. Then best-selling author Shea Serrano joins to discuss his beloved Spurs. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
